page.home.head.title: Digital design and Devlopment program
page.home.title: Graduating & Jobs
page.home.description: Graduates have a variety of digital media skills that can lead them to various content design and development jobs with digital media production studios, advertising companies, design firms, and web and mobile app developers. Graduates may also have opportunities to be part of a team that creates games, digital animations, and dynamic content.
page.home.descriptor: The BCIT student outcomes report presents summary findings from the annual survey of former students administered by BC Stats one to two years after graduation. These reports combine the last three years of available results for the 2020-2022 BCIT Outcomes Surveys of 2019-2021 graduates and for Degree 2017-2019 graduates. The reports are organized into three-page summaries containing information on graduatesâ€™ labour market experiences and opinions regarding their education. More detailed information can be accessed at the BC Student Outcomes website.
page.home.descriptora: To view these results, you may need to have the Adobe Acrobat Reader installed in your Web browser.
page.home.infosession: Attend an upcoming information session for this program:
